text: Big Business is a 1988 American comedy movie about 2 pairs of identical twin girls who are switched at birth in West Virginia and go into two different settings in New York City. Bette Midler acts as Sadie, Lily Tomlin plays Rose. This movie was released on June 10, 1988. It received lukewarm reviews by critics, although it performed quite well at the box office. title: Big Business (1988 movie)
